set.commands:
PACKAGE_NAME=geam PACKAGE_VERSION=0.8.4
#oegimport docbook # optional, but needed to build the documentation oegimport pth # required
oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz
mkdir -p "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}" cp AUTHORS COPYING README THANKS "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}/packages/${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}/"
# --with-pth-prefix=PFX Prefix where Pth is installed (optional) # --disable-pthtest Do not try to compile and run a test Pth program
configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} --bindir=${OEG_BASE_BIN_DIR} --libdir=${OEG_BASE_LIB_DIR} ${CONFIGURE_HOST_PARA} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}
cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
